element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: Given a set of points and an analysis extent that defines the characteristics of a raster layer, this algorithm calculates the angle from each cell in that raster layer to the closest one of the input points.

element.name: LAYER
element.text: A points layer. Attributes associated to this layer are not used for the computation. Just their coordinates are used.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: A layer containing the angle from each cell to the closest input point. Angles are measured in degrees, counting clockwise from North.
